about

At Sesame Burgers and Beer and Five Loaves Cafe, we strive to create a healthier, more sustainable and ultimately, a more responsible way to run our restaurants. Every day we source out the highest quality ingredients that reflect a greener philosophy.

We use Angus Signature Blend Beef. Our chicken and Turkey are antibiotic-free. We maintain an active presence in the community by partnering with local purveyors and makers of produce, nuts, breads, and wine & beer. And in keeping with the Glowfisch Hospitality philosophies, we make our own dressings and condiments as well. We build our restaurants using sustainable materials and with ecologically sound building practices. Our restaurants recycle all glass, plastic and cardboard. Even our “To Go" ware is biodegradable.
View more 
Contact

At Sesame Burgers and Beer®, we're always trying to improve our menu and service. And we love to hear your thoughts, suggestions, and shout-outs. If you ever have any questions or comments about our restaurants, or if you just want to say “Hello," please feel free to send us a message. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Reservations: While we are not currently taking reservations, you are welcome to call the restaurant up to 30 minutes prior to arrival to speak with a host and be added to a call ahead seating list. Thank you for your understanding and we hope to see you soon!

For party requests of 15 or more guests or event space rentals, please fill out the inquiry form below.

Park Circle Daily Specials
Park Circle Daily Specials Special App: Beer Battered Zucchini 
Served with Buffiyaki (Buffalo Teriyaki)
$8 Special Sandwich: Herb Chicken Melt 
Grilled Chicken Breast, Herb Spread, Melted Swiss Cheese, Bacon, and Tomato on Sourdough.
$14 Special Burger: Sesame Crunch Wrap 
Two Smash Patties topped with Pepperjack Cheese in a Tortilla Wrap with Pico, Black Bean Corn Salsa, Shredded Lettuce, Tortilla Chips, and Cowboy Ranch.
$16 Special Dessert: Snickerdoodle Pound Cake $7 Special Cocktail: Gran Ma’s Mule 
Espolon, Splash of Grand Marnier, Lime Juice, and Ginger Beer Garnished with an Orange Slice.
$12 Chefs: Cody Miller and Casey Pinto

Careers

At Sesame Burger and Beer, our hourly team members are one of the greatest assets to our restaurants. We believe in treating all our teammates with dignity, respect, and fairness. We promise you a schedule and environment that allows you to provide great guest service and provide all dining guests with friendly, accommodating Low Country service. We believe in great products, and local, sustainable products delivered to our guests at a great value.
